Mod.description:
A difficulty mod aiming to provide a uniquely painful experience.
[h1] What is Change? [/h1] [list] [*] Wands must be crafted [*] New Map (around twice the depth of vanilla map) [*] Orb requirement to progress through Holy Mountains [*] The Glomb [/list]
[h1] Questions [/h1] [b] How do I acquire wands? [/b] Wands can be acquired from vanilla crafting,
